name: holy ghost story
description:
A short Visual Novel about Northern Irish Catholic Schools and Death. And Games, but just a little...

Beset with a burgeoning hangover, the task before you is clear: exorcise a haunted school and allow the ghost of a schoolgirl to pass on to the next world the way everyone knows how: completing the unfinished business that confines her to this plane.

That unfinished business? Some Maths Homework.

Originally designed as a short visual novel to be released on Halloween, that was delayed due to unforeseen circumstances, this is a zero-budget short story that some people might like.

Left mouse button to advance and select options. Mouse wheel to scroll backwards.

  • Written by Erin Donegan/Woodaba. 
  • Inspired by a conversation with two friends.
  • Made in Ren'Py. 
  • Art and assets from Visual Novel Maker. 
  • Logo design assistance by Joey Wawzonek. 
  • Music by Kevin MacLeod. 
  • Stan Brakhage made one of the bits. Sorry about the theft dude I think you are cool

Full credits in-game.
